game.name: Wonderlanders
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Young protagonist Scout gets transported to the magical world of Atlas and has to return home. A turn-based party-combat RPG with skill-based quicktime elements.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Young protagonist Scout gets transported to the magical world of Atlas and has to return home. A turn-based party-combat RPG with skill-based quicktime elements.
